## Heading

This filter adds formatting to heading text.

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target-rx: "[0-9]"
#| - target:
#|     - "mean"
#|     - mask: true
#|     - style: "text-decoration: underline;"

x <- 1:10
mean(x = 1:10)
median(1:10)
```

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target:
#|      - "x"
#|      - style:
#|            - "background-color: #484848;"

x <- 1:10
```
